text: The Oscars are a great place to look for wedding dress inspiration, and this year, celebs walked the red carpet and partied the night away in white hot gowns that could easily double as dresses for the big day. From Kristen Bell's strapless Cavalli gown to Kelly Osbourne's Badgley Mischka number, Sunday's Academy Awards almost looked like the runway during Bridal Fashion Week - - and we couldn't be happier about it!
